thread.title: Kourtney Kardashian Bakes With Daughter Penelope and Niece North West
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian Bakes With Daughter Penelope and Niece North West

author: Jennifer Drysdale
title: Kourtney Kardashian Bakes With Daughter Penelope and Niece North West
text: Kourtney Kardashian Bakes With Daughter Penelope and Niece North West by Jennifer Drysdale 7:44 PM PST, January 21, 2017 Photo: Getty Images Kourtney Kardashian is spending a little quality time with her girls. The 37-year-old reality star took to Snapchat on Friday to show off how she spent her rainy day: baking with her daughter, Penelope, and her niece, North West. 3-year-old North adorably smiles for the camera in the cute pic while sitting on Kourtney's kitchen island with 4-year-old Penelope and another pal. Photo: Snapchat WATCH: North West Plays Makeup Artist With Khloe Kardashian -- and She Takes Her Job Very Serious Food is clearly something that never fails to put a smile on Nori's face. Kim Kardashian recently shared photos of North's visit to the White House, including a pic where her daughter just couldn't seem to hold back tears in a photo op with Barack Obama. Kim later took to Twitter to explain the reason North was crying : she wanted M&Ms! "Northie! She fell & was crying," the Selfish author wrote. "Potus gave her White House M&Ms& I wanted 2 save them 4 memories so wouldn't let her eat them & she cried again." See the hilarious photo in the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
